item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: IBM, Tesla, Moderna and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in extended trading.

item.title: Beyond Meat shares fall 1%, giving up a triple-digit gain as meme rally fizzles
item.description: The reversal comes just one day after the stock enjoyed its best day ever.

item.title: Western Alliance CEO says alleged loan fraud is 'incredibly frustrating' but isolated issue
item.description: Regional banks are getting a reprieve this week after Western Alliance and Zions reported results that didn't include any new loan meltdowns.

item.title: The biggest crypto wipeout was led not by bitcoin, but much smaller tokens. Here's what happened
item.description: More than 1.6 million traders suffered a combined $19.37 billion erasure of leveraged positions over a 24-hour period beginning Friday, Oct. 10.
